ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT bi.id,m.id as member_id,m.name,m.usr,m.phone,lv.name as level_name,m.level,ac.present_balance, bi.title,bi.amount,bi.csn_amount,bi.state,bi.type,bi.create_time FROM mm_balance_info bi INNER JOIN mm_member m ON bi.member_id=m.id INNER JOIN mm_relation r ON m.id = r.member_id INNER JOIN pt_member_level lv ON lv.value = m.level INNER JOIN mm_account ac ON m.id = ac.member_id WHERE bi.kind = {kind} AND lv.merchant_id={merchant_id} AND r.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id} AND ({state} <0 OR bi.state={state}) AND m.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' AND ({level_value}<0 OR m.level={level_value}) ORDER BY bi.create_time DESC LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mm_balance_info bi INNER JOIN mm_member m ON bi.member_id=m.id INNER JOIN mm_relation r ON m.id = r.member_id INNER JOIN pt_member_level lv ON lv.value = m.level INNER JOIN mm_account ac ON m.id = ac.member_id WHERE bi.kind = {kind} AND lv.merchant_id={merchant_id} AND r.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id} AND ({state} <0 OR bi.state={state}) AND m.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' AND ({level_value}<0 OR m.level={level_value})
